title: The Best Arguments for LIFE with Seth Gruber LIVE from Freedom Night in America
itunes:title: The Best Arguments for LIFE with Seth Gruber LIVE from Freedom Night in America
description:
Charlie sits down with one of the most compelling and articulate defenders of life in the country, Seth Gruber, to equip you with some of the most powerful pro-life arguments that exist to stand up for the unborn in your own spheres of influence. Seth, who's on a nationwide tour of his own called the White Rose Initiative, allows Charlie to play devil's advocate, offering up all of the most common pro-abortion arguments you'll hear in today's culture. Seth and Charlie's conversation will give you the intellectual and spiritual ammunition to shoot down the empty talking points of an indefensible moral position. 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
